explanation: [0-0] A small brown monkey in a yellow outfit is sitting inside a wooden house, looking up and outside.

[0-8] Suddenly, the little monkey stands up and walks to the door, peeking its head out. The camera zooms in as the little monkey stretches its head to look outside. The camera then zooms out to show a man in black clothes and white pants stealing a wooden board outside the door. The man in black looks around and continues to hold the board. At this moment, the little monkey looks back inside the house.
